resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104896</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104896</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206847</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Kidd Safety</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kidd Sicherheit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sûreté De Kidd</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Segurança De Kidd</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sicurezza Di Kidd</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ασφάλεια Kidd</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Seguridad De Kidd</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">features a quiz about safety at home and outdoors. There is a poster about how to prevent injuries, information about eliminating hazards in the home, and bicycle safety tips.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kennzeichnet einen Quiz über Sicherheit zu Hause 
und draußen. Es gibt ein Plakat über, wie man Verletzungen, 
Informationen über das Beseitigen von von Gefahren im Haus 
verhindert, und Fahrradsicherheit neigt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">comporte un jeu au sujet de la sûreté à la 
maison et dehors. Il y a une affiche au sujet de la façon 
empêcher les dommages, informations sur éliminer des risques dans la
maison, et la sûreté de bicyclette incline.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">caracteriza um quiz sobre a segurança na HOME e 
ao ar livre. Há um poster sobre como impedir os ferimentos, 
informação sobre eliminar perigos na HOME, e a segurança da 
bicicleta derruba.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">caratterizza un quiz circa sicurezza nel paese ed 
all'aperto. Ci è un manifesto circa come impedire le lesioni, 
le informazioni sull'eliminazione dei rischi nella sede e la sicurezza
della bicicletta si capovolge.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χαρακτηρίζει έναν διαγωνισμό γνώσεων για την ασφάλεια
στο σπίτι και υπαίθρια. Υπάρχει μια αφίσα για το πώς να 
αποτρέψει τους τραυματισμούς, τις πληροφορίες για την εξάλειψη των
κινδύνων στο σπίτι, και τις συμβουλές ασφάλειας ποδηλάτων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ofrece un concurso sobre seguridad en el país y 
al aire libre. Hay un cartel sobre cómo prevenir lesiones, 
información sobre la eliminación de peligros en el hogar, y la 
seguridad de la bicicleta inclina.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206847</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104896</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/kidd-safety</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
